titles.title: California Clean School Bus Equity Act
California Clean School Bus Equity Act
To amend the Energy Policy Act of 2005 to remove a limitation on amounts provided under the clean school bus program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
California Clean School Bus Equity Act
This bill removes a limitation on amounts that may be provided under the clean school bus program administered by the Environmental Protection Agency.
